import React from 'react'; import { ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; import CreatableSelect from 'react-select/creatable'; import LoadingIndicator from '../common/LoadingIndicator'; function AssetAddFormWizzardStep5(props) { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const handleNext = async () => { await props.formikProps.setTouched({['who_can_contact']:true, ['advance_amount_for_asset']:true, ['monthly_rent_for_asset']:true, ['lease_amount_for_asset']:true, ['lease_period_for_asset']:true, ['lease_period_for_asset_type']:true, ['asset_prices']:true}); if(props.formikProps.errors.who_can_contact == undefined && props.formikProps.errors.advance_amount_for_asset == undefined && props.formikProps.errors.monthly_rent_for_asset == undefined && props.formikProps.errors.lease_amount_for_asset == undefined && props.formikProps.errors.lease_period_for_asset == undefined && props.formikProps.errors.lease_period_for_asset_type == undefined) { props.nextStep(); } }; return (
